item.title: How to deal with introversion
item.description: introversion falls into 2 categories not by choice - shyness, low self esteem etc. if this is the cause, it needs to be worked on. by choice - for example schizoid personality or typical case where one doesnt find most people ‘interesting enough’. these people can talk with interesting people for hours but on average are not talkative. this is okay, we dont need to disorderize this. Introvert - Extrovert is a spectrum.
